sourcesContent:
export const theme = {
    color: {
        white: '#fff',
        alabaster: '#fafafa',
        grey: '#333',
        blueChill: '#138496',
        suvaGrey: '#929292',
        textGrey: '#767676',
        greyLight: '#ccc',
        error: '#d00',
        link: '#0e106a',
        dustyGray: '#999',
        boulder: '#777',
        alto: '#ddd',
        black: '#000',
        backgroundGray: '#dedede',
        gallery: '#eee',
        wildBlueyonder: '#8788b5',
        peppermint: '#dff0d8',
        grayLight: '#f7f7f7',
        mercury: '#e7e7e7',
        springRain: '#aca',
        primary: '#0e357f',
        darkWhite: '#f6f6f6',
        orange: '#ff6000',
        silver: '#bfbfbf',
        gray: '#e3e3e3',
        red: '#db3333',
        chalice: '#aaa',
        frenchGray: '#bbbbbd',
        concrete: '#f3f3f3',
        denim: '#1b5ede',
        silverChalice: '#a4a4a4',
        iron: '#e4e6e8',
        turquoise: '#34E79A',
        cabaret: '#d64c68',
        sirocco: '#717272',
        porcelain: '#EFF1F2',
        cinnabar: '#E74A4B',
    },
    screen: {
        xs: '575px',
        sm: '576px',
        md: '768px',
        lg: '992px',
        xl: '1200px',
    },
};

export const { color, screen } = theme;
